com.sun.enterprise.deployment.archivist

Class AppClientArchivist

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.enterprise.deployment.archivist.Archivist<ApplicationClientDescriptor>
      • com.sun.enterprise.deployment.archivist.AppClientArchivist
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ACCAppClientArchivist

    @Service
@PerLookup
public class AppClientArchivist
extends Archivist<ApplicationClientDescriptor>
    This class is responsible for handling J2EE app client files.
    Author:
    Sheetal Vartak
